title: Greg Kolodziejzyk
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809005029/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809005029/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers): Greg Kolodziejzyk**

Greg founded [Image Club Graphics](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809005029/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Image%20Club) in 1985 and designed several dozen typefaces in the late 80s using first-generation versions of [Fontographer](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809005029/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontographer).

Website:

[http://www.adventuresofgreg.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809005029/http:/www.adventuresofgreg.com/ "http://www.adventuresofgreg.com/")

Identifont profile:

[http://www.identifont.com/show?4GX](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809005029/http:/www.identifont.com/show?4GX "http://www.identifont.com/show?4GX")
author: Grant Hutchinson
